title: Authors and Citation
text: Derek Chiu. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Chiu D (2022). rsf: Report Statistical Findings 'bookdown'. https://github.com/dchiu911/rsf, https://dchiu911.github.io/rsf.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rsf: Report of Statistical Findings in 'bookdown'},   author = {Derek Chiu},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/dchiu911/rsf, https://dchiu911.github.io/rsf}, }

what: Report of Statistical Findings in bookdown
title: Report of Statistical Findings in bookdown
text: goal rsf provide RStudio project template Report Statistical Findings (RSF) using bookdown format. RSF project report, typical sections Introduction, Method, Results. parts RSF often become main supplementary materials manuscript.

title: Report of Statistical Findings in bookdown
text: can install released version rsf CRAN : development version GitHub :

title: Report of Statistical Findings in bookdown
text: installation, can choose rsf project template accessing RStudio menus: File > New Project > New Directory > Report Statistical Findings using bookdown.

title: Git ignore generated outputs — git_ignore_outputs
text: Add generated reports, figures, HTML libraries .gitignore

title: Git ignore generated outputs — git_ignore_outputs
text: path path directory containing input files .gitignore _bookdown.yml. figs_only logical; TRUE (default), figures git ignored.

title: Git ignore generated outputs — git_ignore_outputs
code: # \donttest{ wd <- tempdir() savedir <- setwd(wd) file.copy(list.files(system.file("extdata", package = "rsf"),                      full.names = TRUE, all.files = TRUE, no.. = TRUE), ".") #> [1] TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE file.rename("gitignore", ".gitignore") #> [1] TRUE git_ignore_outputs(figs_only = FALSE) #> ✔ Adding 'docs', '_bookdown_files' to './.gitignore' setwd(savedir) # }

what: rsf: Report of Statistical Findings in 'bookdown' — rsf-package
title: rsf: Report of Statistical Findings in 'bookdown' — rsf-package
text: report statistical findings (RSF) project template generated using 'bookdown' format. 'YAML' fields can customized. Additional helper functions provide extra features RSF.

title: rsf: Report of Statistical Findings in 'bookdown' — rsf-package
text: Maintainer: Derek Chiu dchiu@bccrc.ca

title: Use references — use_references
text: Add References section end RSF.

title: Use references — use_references
text: path path directory containing input files index.Rmd, _output.yml, preamble.tex. number number prepended references Rmd source file.

title: Use references — use_references
code: # \donttest{ wd <- tempdir() savedir <- setwd(wd) file.copy(list.files(system.file("extdata", package = "rsf"),                      full.names = TRUE), ".") #> [1] FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE use_references(number = 4) #> ✔ Adding './src/04-references.Rmd' #> ✔ Modifying './index.Rmd' #> ✔ Modifying './_output.yml' #> ✔ Modifying './preamble.tex' setwd(savedir) # }

title: Use RSF project template — use_rsf
text: Opens new R project using RSF template. Intended use RStudio, interactively.

title: Use RSF project template — use_rsf
text: path project path ... project configurations supported: output_dir _bookdown.yml https://bookdown.org/yihui/bookdown/configuration.html initialize git repo via gert::git_init() initialize renv via renv::init()

title: Use RSF project template — use_rsf
text: function called user selects File > New Project > New Directory > Report Statistical Findings using bookdown. directory name output directory can specified.

title: rsf (development version)
text: Use GitHub Actions CI pkgdown site Add project options initialize git repository /renv private library Add conditions use_references() skip modifications already exist Add setup script call Rmd

title: rsf 0.2.2
text: CRAN release: 2020-04-10 Always hold figure position figure captions Remove latex fix bookdown titlesec incompatibility bug update bookdown (rstudio/bookdown#677)

title: rsf 0.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2020-02-05 Change output_dir docs work nicely GitHub Pages Change gitbook defaults: split_by = "chapter" simplify HTML links, add button download PDF output Update write_index() changes yml_citations() use_index_rmd() ymlthis package Use options(ymlthis.remove_blank_line = TRUE) remove trailing blank line YAML files

title: rsf 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2019-10-05

title: rsf 0.2.0
text: Use ymlthis package writing YAML

title: rsf 0.2.0
text: Decrease space chapter header Don’t use ruled captions tables Set margins 1 inch

title: rsf 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2019-09-04 Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
